1100010010111001 1010101010001001 0 -> sum: 0110111101000010, cout: 1

0110111100000001 1001101010001001 1 -> sum: 0000100110001011, cout: 1
0011000010001000 0000010100111010 1 -> sum: 0011010111000011, cout: 0
1001000100000110 0110100010010101 0 -> sum: 1111100110011011, cout: 0
0101110110110000 1010011111001111 0 -> sum: 0000010101111111, cout: 1

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
